NarrPara.Content: Test schemas with empty declaration parts.
Test chains together with member predicate.
This tests the parsing of nested predicates that contain newlines instead of conjunctions.
This predicate part of this schema should parse into two separate predicates, first the forall, then the $y<a$, because the newline conjunction has lower priority than the forall.
This one should parse the same as the above!
This is how one has to write it to have a conjunction using newlines INSIDE the forall.
This should parse the same as the first one (but uses ;).
This should parse the same as the first one (but with newlines before the operators rather than after).
